response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our latest innovation to you. This product is truly a game-changer and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its actual cost to us. Considering its value, I'm offering it to you for $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, taking into account its high worth to you. I'm confident this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.", "product_price": 12000}
